name: Artifex gladii
description:
A kingdom conflagrated by bloody revolution. 
A noblerat imprisoned in a deep dungeon and devoid of dignity.
One day an opportunity to escape appears and he grasps it.
Help him to find his way out and recover himself.

In this short roguelike I put the focus on fencing mechanic. Movement is crucial for getting a good position in combat and defeating your opponent.

Made for 7DRL 2018 competition.
